de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.distancefunction

Interface DistanceFunction<O,D extends Distance<?>>

  • Type Parameters:
    O - Object type
    D - Distance result type
    All Superinterfaces:
    Parameterizable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DBIDDistanceFunction<D>, DimensionSelectingSubspaceDistanceFunction<O,D>, DoubleNorm<O>, FilteredLocalPCABasedDistanceFunction<O,P,D>, IndexBasedDistanceFunction<O,D>, Norm<O,D>, NumberVectorDistanceFunction<D>, PrimitiveDistanceFunction<O,D>, PrimitiveDoubleDistanceFunction<O>, SpatialPrimitiveDistanceFunction<V,D>, SpatialPrimitiveDoubleDistanceFunction<V>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDatabaseDistanceFunction, AbstractDBIDDistanceFunction, AbstractDimensionsSelectingDoubleDistanceFunction, AbstractEditDistanceFunction, AbstractIndexBasedDistanceFunction, AbstractPreferenceVectorBasedCorrelationDistanceFunction, AbstractPrimitiveDistanceFunction, AbstractSimilarityAdapter, AbstractSpatialDoubleDistanceFunction, AbstractSpatialDoubleDistanceNorm, AbstractVectorDoubleDistanceFunction, AbstractVectorDoubleDistanceNorm, ArcCosineDistanceFunction, ArccosSimilarityAdapter, BrayCurtisDistanceFunction, CanberraDistanceFunction, ChiSquaredDistanceFunction, ClarkDistanceFunction, CosineDistanceFunction, DimensionSelectingDistanceFunction, DimensionSelectingLatLngDistanceFunction, DiSHDistanceFunction, DiskCacheBasedDoubleDistanceFunction, DiskCacheBasedFloatDistanceFunction, DTWDistanceFunction, EDRDistanceFunction, ERiCDistanceFunction, ERPDistanceFunction, EuclideanDistanceFunction, FileBasedDoubleDistanceFunction, FileBasedFloatDistanceFunction, HiSCDistanceFunction, HistogramIntersectionDistanceFunction, HistogramMatchDistanceFunction, HSBHistogramQuadraticDistanceFunction, JaccardPrimitiveSimilarityFunction, JeffreyDivergenceDistanceFunction, JensenShannonDivergenceDistanceFunction, KolmogorovSmirnovDistanceFunction, Kulczynski1DistanceFunction, KullbackLeiblerDivergenceAsymmetricDistanceFunction, KullbackLeiblerDivergenceReverseAsymmetricDistanceFunction, LatLngDistanceFunction, LCSSDistanceFunction, LevenshteinDistanceFunction, LinearAdapterLinear, LinearKernelFunction, LngLatDistanceFunction, LnSimilarityAdapter, LocallyWeightedDistanceFunction, LocalSubspaceDistanceFunction, LorentzianDistanceFunction, LPIntegerNormDistanceFunction, LPNormDistanceFunction, ManhattanDistanceFunction, MaximumDistanceFunction, MinimumDistanceFunction, MinKDistance, MultiLPNorm, NormalizedLevenshteinDistanceFunction, PCABasedCorrelationDistanceFunction, PearsonCorrelationDistanceFunction, PolynomialKernelFunction, ProxyDistanceFunction, RandomStableDistanceFunction, RGBHistogramQuadraticDistanceFunction, SharedNearestNeighborJaccardDistanceFunction, SparseEuclideanDistanceFunction, SparseLPNormDistanceFunction, SparseManhattanDistanceFunction, SparseMaximumDistanceFunction, SqrtJensenShannonDivergenceDistanceFunction, SquaredEuclideanDistanceFunction, SquaredPearsonCorrelationDistanceFunction, SubspaceEuclideanDistanceFunction, SubspaceLPNormDistanceFunction, SubspaceManhattanDistanceFunction, SubspaceMaximumDistanceFunction, TutorialDistanceFunction, WeightedCanberraDistanceFunction, WeightedDistanceFunction, WeightedEuclideanDistanceFunction, WeightedLPNormDistanceFunction, WeightedManhattanDistanceFunction, WeightedMaximumDistanceFunction, WeightedPearsonCorrelationDistanceFunction, WeightedSquaredEuclideanDistanceFunction, WeightedSquaredPearsonCorrelationDistanceFunction

    public interface DistanceFunction<O,D extends Distance<?>>
extends Parameterizable
    Base interface for any kind of distances.

      DistanceQuery<T,D>      		 instantiate(Relation<T> relation)

      boolean isMetric()
      Is this distance function metric (in particular, does it satisfy the triangle equation?)

      Is this function symmetric?

        Is this function symmetric?
        Returns:

        boolean isMetric()
        Is this distance function metric (in particular, does it satisfy the triangle equation?)
        Returns:
        true when metric.
